p: The activity on MCF-7 cells was higher for the samples from P. lentiscus (73%), and it was the only cell line sensitive to the essential oil from P. vera. Essential oils from P. terebinthus were active in 44% of cases, while the two oils from P. integerrima had a weak effect or were inactive. The two most active samples were from P. lentiscus leaves (sample B: IC 50 = 239.6 µg/mL), from P. terebinthus galls (sample AB: IC 50 = 254.9 µg/mL) and from P. vera nuts (sample A3: IC 50 = 290.6 µg/mL).
